Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won the match by 5 wickets (DLS method)
Pre-Game Insights: The pitch had cracks but was expected to be playable. The toss winners chose to bat first, which was a strategic decision.
Sri Lanka had a strong recent record against the West Indies, winning their last 6 matches.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium in Kandy, known for its dry and cracked pitch which favors spinners.
